question:
Consider the following statements about the programme SATYAM
  1. It is an initiative under Ministry of AYUSH
  2. The programme encourages the research on the effect of Yoga and Meditation on physical and mental health of an individual
Which of the above statements is/are correct?
explanation: First statement is incorrect because the programme is an initiative under the Ministry of Science & Technology. SATYAM stands for (“Science and Technology of Yoga and Meditation”). It aims to harness knowledge obtained in academic institutions and other related agencies for finding Science & Technology -led solutions. The programme encourages research in two major thematic areas investigations on the effect of Yoga and meditation on physical and mental health, and investigations on the effect of Yoga & meditation on the body, brain and mind in terms of basic processes occurring therein.
